title: Where is The item sets page?
body: I have been thinking of updating my builds for my champions, but when i noticed that the new client doesnt have the tab for the item set, (Where you have your personal builds where it usually says recommended on the top of the shop in game) i dont see it or know if it still is in the client itself. Please if anyone knows where it is please tell me. Your help is really appreciated {{champion:103}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:103}}

replies.body:
Item Sets haven't made it to the new client. It's unknown whether they will be added to the new client at a later date, but I know that you can still use them (just not create or edit them) in the new client. You simply have to edit/create them in the Legacy client, then hop into a custom match to confirm they loaded up in the Legacy Client before you hop back into the Beta client where they should show up in-game. 

Let me know if you have any other questions.
I also have not been able to find the item set page in the new client.
